column4: [ 1621.828671] Buffer I/O error on device fd0, logical block 0
The numbers inside the brackets change though, they increase buy 2s
Odd. fd0 is usually the floppy drive. I thought you were talking about dvd drives?
I am, I dont have a floppy drive thats whats weird, although I do have a multi card reader below but nothing but a usb cable is connected to it
